Package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter

Class SplittableRandomAdapter.ThreadLocalFields

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter.SplittableRandomAdapter.ThreadLocalFields
  • Enclosing class:
    SplittableRandomAdapter
    protected static class SplittableRandomAdapter.ThreadLocalFields
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the SplittableRandom and the entropy counter for a thread. Extracted into an object so that only one ThreadLocal has to be accessed (a slow operation) when both of these are needed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong entropyBits
      Stores the entropy count for splittableRandom.
      java.util.SplittableRandom splittableRandom
      The SplittableRandom that generates random numbers when called on this thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ThreadLocalFields​(java.util.SplittableRandom splittableRandom)
      Creates an instance for a given SplittableRandom that has not been used before.
